alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lake; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 6:41PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northwestern Geauga...Cuyahoga...southwestern Lake and north central Summit Counties Until 815 PM EST.... At 640 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band near Cleveland Heights, or 8 miles south of Willowick, moving south at 10 mph. Additional heavy snow showers may drift off of Lake Erie as well. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations that may be impacted include...Cleveland, Painesville, Willowick, Fairport Harbor, Parma, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, North Royalton, Solon, Willoughby, Twinsburg, Eastlake, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, Highland Hills, Timberlake, Lakeline, Chesterland and Garfield Heights. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 306, 307, 308, 312, 313, 314, 317, 318, 319, 320, 322, 323, 324, 326, 328, 329, 330, and 331.
